sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YE164010 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.MDXPS_VVAL_KRN_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM PDF_B101Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD= AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR= AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD= AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY= AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.RESID = AA.RESNO_ENC_CNTN )
RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO YE164010 (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, MDXPS_SEIL_NUM, MDXPS_VVAL_KRN_CD, BSNO_ENC_CNTN, RESNO_ENC_CNTN, YN, PLYM_NM, MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD, SCNT, USE_AMT, YN2, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD, AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AC02.SYSTEMKEY, ( ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AC02.DPOB_CD ASC, AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR ASC, AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD ASC, AC02.SYSTEMKEY ASC)) + (SELECT (NVL (MAX (MDXPS_SEIL_NUM), 0) + 1) FROM YE164010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#)) AS ROWCNT , 'Y0140000', /* 국세청 */ AC03.BUSNID, AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN, (CASE WHEN AC02.SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD = 'Y0120000' OR AC02.DSBR_DDC_CL_CD IN ('1', '2', '3') OR ( (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR (AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN, 7, 1)) IN ('3', '4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR (AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN, 1, 6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR (AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN, 1, 6) END) <= '19521231' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END)) = '1' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END) AS YN , /* 본인등해당여부 */
AC03.TRADE_NM, 'Y0060001', /* 의료비증빙코드 */
AC03.SCNT, /* 의료비건수 */
AC03.MAN_SUM, '0', #kybdr#, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.RESID, AA.BUSNID, AA.TRADE_NM, SUM (AA.MAN_SUM) AS MAN_SUM, COUNT (AA.RESID) AS SCNT FROM PDF_B101Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND AC01.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.RESID) GROUP BY AA.DPOB_CD, AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR, AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.RESID, AA.BUSNID, AA.TRADE_NM) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID)

INSERT INTO YE164010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , MDXPS_SEIL_NUM , MDXPS_VVAL_KRN_CD , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR )
( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ( ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC, YRTX_BLGG_YR ASC, CLUT_SEPT_CD ASC, SYSTEMKEY ASC)) + (SELECT (NVL(MAX(MDXPS_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1) AS MDXPS_SEIL_NUM FROM YE164010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) )
, 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DECODE(YN,'여','1','0') , PLYM_NM , (CASE WHEN TRIM(MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD) = '1' THEN 'Y0060001' WHEN TRIM(MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD) = '2' THEN 'Y0060002' WHEN TRIM(MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD) = '3' THEN 'Y0060003' WHEN TRIM(MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD) = '4' THEN 'Y0060004' ELSE 'Y0060005' END) , SCNT , USE_AMT , DECODE(YN2,'여','1','') , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167320 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
)

INSERT INTO YE164010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #resnoEncCntn# , #yn# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #plymNm# , #mdxpsPrfClCd# , #scnt# , #useAmt# , #yn2# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE164010 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , YN=#yn# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , PLYM_NM=#plymNm# , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD=#mdxpsPrfClCd# , SCNT=#scnt# , USE_AMT=#useAmt# , YN2=#yn2# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE164010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE164010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , YN , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , PLYM_NM , MDXPS_PRF_CL_CD , SCNT , USE_AMT , YN2 , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE164010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE164010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
